trends: There have been 4 other sightings in San Marcos
There were no other sightings in San Marcos on or around August 10th 2007
Summary: High altitude red star-type moving object across sky very fast.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking my dog close to the given time, and looked up for no particular reason and noticed a red, star or planet like object...but noticed that it was jetting across the sky very fast. If it were a military aircraft, I assume at these speeds it would have made a sonic boom, and it was very high up, as it resembled no more than a dark red dot (like a pimple) in the sky. I've seen another thing before, but not here. This looked like Mars was soaring through our atmosphere at Mach 3, in a straight line at a consistent speed. I saw it for about six seconds, and then it hit the cloud line, where it was no longer visible. I immediately called my friend, who had seen a more dramatic episode before, and he was happy to hear about it. No photos, video, etc. available. The time area is accurate, I just saw it and decided to report it. It seemed to be going north - west, from "The Zone" toward "Texas State University Campus". That's all!
